hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Ibn Umar: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: 'The keys of the unseen are five, none knows them except Allah the Mighty: None knows what will happen tomorrow, none knows what is in the wombs, none knows what will be tomorrow, no soul knows in which land it will die except Allah, and none knows when it will rain except Allah'

narrators.name: Dabbah ibn Muhsin
narrators.alternative_names: Dabbah ibn Muhsin al-Anazi, Dabbah al-Basri

narrators.name: Abbad ibn Maysarah

narrators.name: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ
